snippet: A compromise between a developer and groups opposing plans to build housing at the former site of St. Vincent’s will include the construction of a school.
abstract: New York City Council Speaker Christine C Quinn announces a deal with the Rudin West Village group for development of the site of the former St Vincent's Hospital; compromise will reduce the number of new luxury apartments to be built on the site, convert a state office building nearby to a public school and provide money for arts education in local schools.
lead_paragraph: A compromise between a developer and groups opposing plans to build housing at the former site of St. Vincent’s will include the construction of a school.

headline.seo: Deal Reached for Former Site of Hospital
headline.main: Deal Reached for Former Site of St. Vincent’s Hospital
headline.print_headline: Deal Reached For Former Site Of St. Vincent’s
